title: My First Lee Sin Montage (OCE)

embed.description: Hey guys here are all my best clips I had before the new Rift map was released. I just started getting some cool stuff but it's on the new rift and I didn't want to mix clips between the 2, so hopefully you guys enjoy this one.

body:
All the clips I got in a couple months before new rift came out.. got some better clips but they're all on new rift :L 
Constructive criticism is welcome, all just for a bit of fun so have a watch <3 {{champion:64}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3074}}

replies.body:
Just asking are you Korean or just doing because Korea is the best?

I'm asking because i am Korean.

Wow that was awesome! A mighty fine montage you have created there friend. Very nice editing skills you have. That was fun to watch. Deserves a lot of recognition. Keep up the great work man! I definitely enjoyed it.

Lee Sin BABY!{{champion:64}}

> Wow that was awesome! A mighty fine montage you have created there friend. Very nice editing skills you have. That was fun to watch. Deserves a lot of recognition. Keep up the great work man! I definitely enjoyed it.
> 
> Lee Sin BABY!{{champion:64}}

Lee Sin...is so broken early game...




















Hence why i play him for Jungle ;)

Honestly a decent majority of your montage is people being bad (Example being that Ahri that had you killed but ulted so she missed her Q on the way back.) rather then you necessarily being all that good.
